subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr won the L.P.G.A. Championship by a record 12 strokes, which will make her the first American woman with a No. 1 ranking since 1993.
snippet: Cristie Kerr won the L.P.G.A. Championship by a record 12 strokes, which will make her the first American woman with a No. 1 ranking since 1993.
